display_long_description:
Download now and explore VAIL’s free-to-play Citadel, engage in high-intensity 5v5 battles on four new free-to-play maps, and unlock VAIL Combat to discover why VAIL is the highest rated VR Shooter.

[media]

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

[media]

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

[media]

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

[media]

# **CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED**

[media]

Download now and explore VAIL’s free-to-play Citadel, engage in high-intensity 5v5 battles on four new free-to-play maps, and unlock VAIL Combat to discover why VAIL is the highest rated VR Shooter.

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393687_512109028220024_8255635767100546886_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=gWY1WD93O5QQ7kNvwF_r8d4&_nc_oc=AdmBoiyd-ksPjohYKLKrTvhZUZbD4w5yG3w1CxBZM85uviVHMQsJ4SEN54kuBlfkFG0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=z631JpR9CKFHV-TCACYVfg&oh=00_AfOmTOdPYhrZJeCCsVPiTwFJ13y6844bKKAKDn6PoibTTw&oe=68557836)

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393292_972139874890841_7067035628286260950_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Bv_pWdjpuicQ7kNvwHoLRm7&_nc_oc=AdkX2I8KmLGMb-0uWuJvpjlU2H2WZ3xfb-Sqw8hq_xtD-qoPc1CNz45OXPNCkgpY-Rs&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=z631JpR9CKFHV-TCACYVfg&oh=00_AfPoCCnLkezKJiJsiDyhbadz5SrXLQ5QB7VG-rP_TpZmzg&oe=685589E9)

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473391906_1043942824415838_4920723583868365724_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ZaAVqFYD3VEQ7kNvwHbjtDP&_nc_oc=AdlFsr4dPkMgCJ7l2YtqqOaBPfqH5Tvgi3ZAIsLJ09NGgms8528FjKK4D6Yoij3ykDU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=z631JpR9CKFHV-TCACYVfg&oh=00_AfPykfk39s26vLjZAZf6nEjsQDFzejvjV3P_p1y9U6Ln9Q&oe=685599DD)
